title: How to Catch Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf in Pokémon Black 2 and White 2

steps.title: Beat the Elite 4 and Champion.
steps.content: Beat the Elite 4 and Champion. You need to do this before you're able to catch these Pokémon.

steps.title: Go west of Virbank City to Route 20.
steps.content: Go west of Virbank City to Route 20.

steps.title: Go to the southern part of the route (near the dark grass) and use Surf.
steps.content: Go to the southern part of the route (near the dark grass) and use Surf. Go south and then west until you find a waterfall. Use Waterfall and go west until you reach a fork. Go south, then west until you find a cave. Enter it.

steps.title: You'll trigger a cutscene where Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf appear, and they'll head off to three different locations.
steps.content: You'll trigger a cutscene where Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf appear, and they'll head off to three different locations.

steps.title: Go to the museum to the north.
steps.content: Go to the museum to the north. There, go into the middle of the circular area, and a text box will appear asking if you want to check the area. Say yes, and Uxie will appear.

steps.title: Talk to it to battle it.
steps.content: Talk to it to battle it.

steps.title: Go to Celestial Tower, which is located on Route 7, north of Mistralton City.
steps.content: Go to Celestial Tower, which is located on Route 7, north of Mistralton City.

steps.title: Go up the tower until you reach the top, where the bell is.
steps.content: Go up the tower until you reach the top, where the bell is.

steps.title: Go to the area just before the stairs, and a text box will appear asking if you want to check the area.
steps.content: Go to the area just before the stairs, and a text box will appear asking if you want to check the area. Say yes, and Mesprit will appear.

steps.title: Talk to it to battle it.
steps.content: Talk to it to battle it.

steps.title: Go to Route 23, west of the Giant Chasm.
steps.content: Go to Route 23, west of the Giant Chasm. You'll want to go there by flying to Victory Road, and then going south to Route 23.

steps.title: Go down the stairs, then go west.
steps.content: Go down the stairs, then go west. Cut down the bush using Cut, then go west until you reach a plateau with a large boulder.

steps.title: Go up the stairs, and a text box will appear asking if you want to check the area.
steps.content: Go up the stairs, and a text box will appear asking if you want to check the area. Say yes, and Azelf will appear.

steps.title: Talk to it to battle it.
steps.content: Talk to it to battle it.
